title: AUTO-DZ-ACT — 3I/ATLAS Daily Observational Snapshots (2025-07-01 → 2026-01-29)
description: Raw, non-instrumental observational archive for 3I/ATLAS (Interstellar Object) collected from official astronomical data sources. Contains 214 daily timestamped snapshots (2025-07-01 to 2026-01-29) with complete cryptographic integrity verification (SHA-256) and provenance documentation. Data aggregated from: IAU Minor Planet Center (MPC), NASA/JPL Small-Body Database (SBDB), NASA/JPL Horizons, ESA Near-Earth Object Coordination Centre (NEOCC), NASA Center for Near-Earth Object Studies (CNEOS), and NASA Planetary Data System Small Bodies Node. Each snapshot includes source attribution, retrieval timestamps (ISO 8601 UTC), and content verification hashes. Archive operates under provenance-based archiving standards with immutability protection. No scientific analysis, interpretation, or instrumental observation—raw institutional data preservation only. Part of AUTO-DZ-ACT cosmic observatory framework (Layer-1 data collection) governed by TRIZEL-BASELINE-v1.0.0.

dates.description: Temporal coverage of daily observational snapshots
